mapper.sql: forms.id AS id, forms.name AS name, forms.form_type AS formTypeId, (CASE WHEN forms.form_type = 1 THEN 'ទម្រង់ធម្មតា' WHEN forms.form_type = 2 THEN 'ទម្រង់ពិសេស' END) AS formTypeName, (SELECT CONCAT(us.`full_name`, ' ', us.`username`) FROM `users_api` AS us WHERE us.`is_active` = 1 AND us.`id` = forms.created_by LIMIT 1) as createdByUser, DATE_FORMAT(forms.created, '%d-%b-%Y') AS created
mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, name AS name, form_type_id AS formTypeId, (SELECT `name` FROM `form_types` WHERE `id` = sub_forms.form_type_id LIMIT 1) AS formTypeName, status AS status, ordering AS ordering FROM `sub_forms` WHERE form_id = #{formId} ORDER BY sub_forms.ordering ASC
SELECT id AS id, name AS name FROM `sub_sub_forms` WHERE sub_form_id = #{subFormId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO forms( name, form_type, created, created_by, is_active) VALUES( #{form.name}, #{form.formType}, NOW(), #{form.createdBy}, #{form.isActive});

INSERT INTO sub_forms ( form_id, name, form_type_id, remarks, status, ordering ) VALUES ( #{subFormRequest.formId}, #{subFormRequest.name}, #{subFormRequest.formTypeId}, #{subFormRequest.remarks}, #{subFormRequest.status}, #{subFormRequest.ordering} );
mapper.update: UPDATE forms SET is_active = 2, modified = NOW(), modified_by = 1 WHERE id = #{id};
